text: I found this interesting code-generated design class while looking through Skillshare offerings and thought of you <@U02618EV1>, not sure if it's your jam but you should check it out: <http://www.skillshare.com/classes/design/Programming-Graphics-I-Introduction-to-Generative-Art/782118657?via=browse-popular-design>

attachments.title: Programming Graphics I: Introduction to Generative Art
attachments.text: Generative art is all about using programming to generate artwork that is algorithmically defined and created. In this project-based class, you'll learn how to create your own series of patterns using generative art techniques and computer programming! What You'll Learn How to setup your programming environment for making generative artwork. An introduction to Processing and the HYPE Framework. With the HYPE Framew...
attachments.fallback: Skillshare: Programming Graphics I: Introduction to Generative Art

text: I saw this guy speak at the TYPO conference a few years back, he's awesome.
